dialogue.content: My breathing feels tight when I exercise sometimes.
Does it happen right away or after a few minutes? Anything that makes it worse?
After a few minutes, and cold air makes it noticeably worse.
What kind of exercise is it-walking, running, cycling?
Mostly brisk walking. I don't want to stop moving.
That's a good goal. Do you usually carry anything with you on walks?
Not usually. I just head out.
Okay-let's make it practical and easy to remember for cold days.
I'd feel a lot safer if cold-weather walks didn't turn into a breathing issue.

memory.reliever_inhaler_use: has a reliever inhaler but often forgets to bring it
